name: Brocken Top Bock
description: Broken Top Bock is a malt forward, high gravity lager with a subtle aroma and warming sweetness.  Czech Saaz hops balance a diverse malt composition that creates the flavor, color and mouth feel.  The lager yeast chosen for this beer plays an important role in the flavor contribution, adding sweet fruit overtones.
